GiveTwice is a new project, aiming to la: GiveTwice is a new project, aiming to launch in early 2026. We don't have a track record yet — no revenue, no profits, and therefore no donations to report. We're building this from scratch, with the goal of making gift-giving more meaningful.
GiveTwice will always be free to use. We: GiveTwice will always be free to use. We'll never sell your data. After covering minimal operating costs, every cent of profit goes to charity. And we'll keep making this product better — on our own time — because we genuinely believe gift-giving should be simple, beautiful, and meaningful.

We believe gift-giving should be joyful: We believe gift-giving should be joyful and meaningful.
We believe it would be misleading to pub: We believe it would be misleading to publish empty reports or projections. Instead, we'll wait until we have real data to share.
We believe tools you use should be a joy: We believe tools you use should be a joy to use. GiveTwice is built with care — clean, modern, and thoughtfully designed down to the smallest detail.
We've built GiveTwice around a simple id: We've built GiveTwice around a simple idea: 100% of our affiliate profits go to charity. But promises are easy to make — we believe in proving them.
Because sharing your wishlist should fee: Because sharing your wishlist should feel as good as receiving the gift.
We noticed that existing wishlist apps o: We noticed that existing wishlist apps often feel impersonal or cluttered with ads. We wanted to create something simple, focused, and meaningful.
We do things differently. We're complete: We do things differently. We're completely transparent about how we make money: affiliate commissions, with 100% of profits going to charity.
We want to be completely upfront: \"100%: We want to be completely upfront: "100% of profits" means we first cover our operating costs — servers, essential software subscriptions, and any legal expenses. What remains goes entirely to charity.
We run as lean as possible. No fancy off: We run as lean as possible. No fancy offices, no bloated team, no unnecessary tools. We keep overhead to an absolute minimum so more money reaches the causes that matter.
When someone buys a gift from your wishl: When someone buys a gift from your wishlist, the store pays us a small affiliate commission. We donate 100% of the profits to charity.
When someone buys from your wishlist, st: When someone buys from your wishlist, stores pay us a commission. We donate all of it.
We rotate our charity partners seasonall: We rotate our charity partners seasonally. Check back for updates on which organizations we're currently supporting.
We'll automatically fetch the product ti: We'll automatically fetch the product title, image, and price.
We'll send you a confirmation link to ve: We'll send you a confirmation link to verify your claim.
We're here to help! Reach out and we'll: We're here to help! Reach out and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
We're publishing this page now — before: We're publishing this page now — before we launch — to hold ourselves accountable. When the time comes, you'll find our transparency reports right here. If we're not living up to our promises, we want you to call us out.
Welcome to :app, a wishlist platform wit: Welcome to :app, a wishlist platform with a purpose.
